title: Immigration graph 1821 to 1910 - short term effect

content.description: Questions refers to the graph below.
content.question: The pattern depicted in the graph in the first half of the nineteenth century most directly resulted in

choices.label: the formation of a political party that promoted nativism
federal provision of financial assistance to immigrants
a more unified national culture that embraced immigrants

content.answer: the formation of a political party that promoted nativism

skill.text: Skill 5.A: Identify patterns among or connections between historical developments and processes.
